member.name: T:ESADS.eUtility
member.summary: Contains static methods used to convert measurments from one unit system to the other and other utility methods.

member.name: F:ESADS.eUtility.SystemForceUnit
member.summary: The force unit used in the calculations in the background. All other units are converted to this for use in low level libraries(eg. ESADS_Mechanics)

member.name: F:ESADS.eUtility.SystemLengthUnit
member.summary: The length unit used in the calculations in the background. All other units are converted to this for use in low level libraries(eg. ESADS_Mechanics)

member.name: M:ESADS.eUtility.Convert(System.Double,ESADS.eLengthUnits,ESADS.eLengthUnits)
member.summary: Converts length from one unit system to the other.
member.param: Length that is goint to be converted from one unit system to the other.
The current unit system of the measurment.
The unit system to which the measurment is going to be converted.

member.name: M:ESADS.eUtility.Convert(System.Double,ESADS.eForceUints,ESADS.eForceUints)
member.summary: Converts force from one unit system to the other.
member.param: Force that is going to be converted from one unit system to the other.
The current unit system of the measurment.
The unit system to which the measurment is going to be converted.

member.name: M:ESADS.eUtility.Convert(System.Double,ESADS.eLengthUnits,ESADS.eForceUints,ESADS.eLengthUnits,ESADS.eForceUints)
member.summary: Converts stress from one unit system to the other.
member.param: The magnitude of the stress that is going to be converted.
Length unit used in the input stress.
Force unit used in the input stress.
Length unit system used in the out put stress.
Force unit system used in the out put stress.

member.name: M:ESADS.eUtility.Convert(System.Double,ESADS.eLengthUnits,ESADS.eLengthUnits,ESADS.eForceUints,ESADS.eForceUints)
member.summary: Converts moment from one unit sytem to the other.
member.param: The magnitude of moment that is going to be converted.
Length unit system used in the input moment.
Length unit system used in the output moment.
Force unit system used in the input moment.
Force unit system used in the output moment.

member.name: M:ESADS.eUtility.Sort(System.Double[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sorts the one dimensional double array in the specified order.
member.param: True to sort in ascending order, otherwise false.

member.name: T:ESADS.eLengthUnits
member.summary: Specifies different unit systems used to measure length.

member.name: T:ESADS.eForceUints
member.summary: Specifies different unit systems used to measure force.

member.name: F:ESADS.eForceUints.Kip
member.summary: Represents Imperial unit system, Kilo Pounds
